attributes.action: Stop People from getting money 2 look after loved ones
attributes.additional_details: Calling on Her Majestys Government to urge the Department for Work and Pensions, to Debate and Discuss in the House of Commons or in one of the Select Commitees, Preferably the Work and Pensions Commitee thats Chaired by Dame Anne Begg MP to Debate the Issue im Proposing to make it a The Law in Britain that Families or Parents/Relatives Cannot Charge Money for Caring for there Loved Ones, thats got a Disabillity or Struggling,Because I think and it Should be about Unconditional Love, I know it happens Every day Some People Would,nt do it and Would do it, and Would think its a Good idea and theres Already Rules to Block it  from takeing Place, but if the Petition Gets through and MPS debated it and thought it Should Be Made a Law then i would suggest it was Added to the Equality Act 2010 Passed by Her Majestys Government
